column5: We have a 16 ft. Peterborough boat, center console,  and we can't find the company on the internet.  Was it taken over by another company?  We want to be able to order parts.  Pam
Don't know if this is any help Pam  www.ctidirectory.com/search/company.cfm?company=100790
Thanks Lew.   But that is the wooden boat factory, I have a fiberglass boat.  Pam
I believe Peterborough went out of business a few years back. I don't think they were bought out. You maybe SOL.

I beleive the peterborough boat line was built by OMC which was in peterborough, but they went out of business or were bought out quite a few years ago  look at the hull tag it should have some info on were and when it was built as well as a old address and you can search with that on the internet   I would not bother trying to find the company for oem parts anyway just search on the internet on the part you need and I guarantee you will find them, they were a very popular boat along with the sunray line and the javelin line many years ago   Troy
Pam,  I believe this is the history of "The Peterboroughâ€™s Canoe Industry"  Peterborough Canoe Co.  Tom
Thank you so much Troy, that's a big help.  Pam
